thread.title: NOTICE TO ADVERTISER. Since September 29, 1991,

title: NOTICE TO ADVERTISER. Since September 29, 1991,
text:
NOTICE TO ADVERTISER. Since September 29, 1991, ad date: 10/07/2015 
NOTICE TO ADVERTISER. Since September 29, 1991, advertising for used woodstoves has been limited to models which have been certified by the Oregon Department of Environmental Quality (DEQ) and the Federal Environmental Protection Agency (EPA) as having met smoke emission standards. A certified woodstove can be identified by its certification label, which is permanently attached to the stove. The Curry Coastal Pilot will not knowingly accept advertising for the sale of uncertified woodstoves.
